statements: SELECT test_name, test_result FROM test_results WHERE tester_name = 'Alice';
SELECT test_name, test_result, tester_name FROM test_results WHERE test_date = '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM test_results WHERE test_result = 'Pass' ORDER BY tester_name DESC;
SELECT test_name, test_result FROM test_results ORDER BY test_date ASC;
SELECT tester_name, test_date FROM test_results WHERE test_result = 'Fail';
SELECT * FROM test_results WHERE test_result = 'Pass' ORDER BY test_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT test_name, tester_name, test_date FROM test_results WHERE test_name LIKE '%unit%' AND tester_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT tester_name, test_date, test_result FROM test_results WHERE test_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY test_date ASC;
SELECT test_name, test_result FROM test_results WHERE test_result = 'Fail' AND tester_name LIKE '%Smith%' ORDER BY test_name ASC;
SELECT test_name, SUM(test_id) AS total_tests FROM test_results GROUP BY test_name HAVING total_tests > 100 ORDER BY total_tests DESC;
SELECT * FROM test_results;
SELECT test_name, test_result FROM test_results WHERE test_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT test_id, test_name, test_date, test_result FROM test_results WHERE test_result = 'Pass' ORDER BY test_date DESC;
SELECT test_name, test_result FROM test_results WHERE test_result = 'Fail' ORDER BY test_name ASC;
SELECT criteria_description, criteria_weight FROM test_criteria WHERE criteria_weight > 0.5 ORDER BY criteria_weight DESC;
SELECT * FROM test_results WHERE test_id = 1;
SELECT test_name, test_result FROM test_results WHERE test_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT test_name, test_result, test_date FROM test_results WHERE test_result = 'Pass' ORDER BY test_date DESC;
SELECT test_id, test_name, test_date, test_result, criteria_description FROM test_results JOIN test_criteria ON test_results.test_id = test_criteria.criteria_id;
SELECT test_name, test_result, criteria_weight FROM test_results LEFT JOIN test_criteria ON test_results.test_id = test_criteria.criteria_id WHERE criteria_weight > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM test_results;
SELECT test_name, test_result FROM test_results WHERE test_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT observation_notes FROM test_observations WHERE result_id = 1;
SELECT person_name, department FROM test_personnel WHERE person_role = 'Technician';
SELECT observation_date, observation_notes FROM test_observations ORDER BY observation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM test_results WHERE test_result='Pass';
SELECT test_date, test_name FROM test_results WHERE test_result='Fail';
SELECT test_name, test_date, test_result FROM test_results WHERE test_date>'2022-01-01';
SELECT person_name, person_role FROM test_personnel WHERE department='Quality Assurance';
SELECT observation_notes FROM test_observations WHERE observation_date>'2022-06-01';
SELECT * FROM test_results;
SELECT test_name, test_result FROM test_results WHERE test_result = 'Pass';
SELECT tester_name, department FROM testers ORDER BY department DESC;
SELECT test_results.test_name, test_cases.case_description, test_results.tested_at FROM test_results INNER JOIN test_cases ON test_results.id = test_cases.case_id;
SELECT tester_name, department, test_logs.result_description FROM testers JOIN test_logs ON testers.tester_id = test_logs.tester_id WHERE test_logs.test_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM test_results ORDER BY tested_at DESC;
SELECT test_name, test_result FROM test_results WHERE test_result='Passed';

SELECT testers.tester_name, test_results.test_name, test_logs.result_description FROM test_logs JOIN testers ON test_logs.tester_id=testers.tester_id JOIN test_results ON test_logs.test_id=test_results.id;

SELECT test_results.test_name, test_results.test_result, testers.tester_name FROM test_results INNER JOIN test_logs ON test_results.id = test_logs.test_id INNER JOIN testers ON test_logs.tester_id = testers.tester_id WHERE testers.department='QA';

SELECT test_results.test_name, test_cases.case_description, test_cases.expected_result FROM test_results LEFT JOIN test_cases ON test_results.id = test_cases.case_id WHERE test_results.test_result='Failed';
SELECT * FROM Testers;
SELECT tester_name, tester_email FROM Testers ORDER BY tester_name DESC;
SELECT t.tester_name, ts.test_score FROM Testers t INNER JOIN TestScores ts ON t.tester_id = ts.tester_id;
SELECT tl.log_message FROM TestLogs tl LEFT JOIN Testers t ON tl.tester_id = t.tester_id WHERE t.tester_name = 'Alice';
SELECT test_name, COUNT(*) AS total_tests FROM Tests GROUP BY test_name HAVING total_tests > 2;
SELECT * FROM Testers;
SELECT * FROM Tests WHERE test_name = 'Unit Testing';
SELECT tester_name, tester_email FROM Testers ORDER BY tester_name DESC;
SELECT test_name, test_description FROM Tests WHERE test_id IN (SELECT test_id FROM TestResults WHERE result_status = 'PASS');
SELECT tester_name, test_id, test_score FROM Testers JOIN TestScores ON Testers.tester_id = TestScores.tester_id ORDER BY test_score DESC
